p: Furthermore, the results obtained against C. albicans indicate that the F4, Ooil and Unoil, have a good antifungal effect (diameter of inhibition of 4.3–4.5 cm) compared to that reported with the antifungal drug Amphotericin B (2.1 cm in diameter) [ 10]. The origin of the plant material, as well as the method of obtaining the essential oil fractions, were determinants for the antifungal activity, according to reports by García and collaborators who evaluated oregano oil extracted by supercritical fluids against the same strain of C. albicans and obtained less than 1 cm of inhibition [ 8].
